text: avare neritan venti ninnalute kalivil petta ella saktiyum, kettinirttiya kutirakaleyum ninnal orukkuka. atumukhena allahuvinreyum ninnaluteyum satruveyum, avarkk purame ninnal ariyattavarum allahu ariyunnavarumaya marrucilareyum ninnal bhayappetuttuvan venti. ninnal allahuvinre margattil etearu vastu celavaliccalum ninnalkkatinre purnnamaya pratiphalam nalkappetum. ninnaleat aniti kanikkappetunnatalla
